    • Method Detail

      • spawn

        public <A> ActorRef<ShardingEnvelope<A>> spawn(scala.Function1<java.lang.String,Behavior<A>> behavior,
                                               Props entityProps,
                                               EntityTypeKey<A> typeKey,
                                               ClusterShardingSettings settings,
                                               int maxNumberOfShards,
                                               A handOffStopMessage)
        Description copied from interface: ClusterSharding
        Spawn a shard region or a proxy depending on if the settings require role and if this node has such a role.

        Messages are sent to the entities by wrapping the messages in a ShardingEnvelope with the entityId of the recipient actor. A HashCodeMessageExtractor will be used for extracting entityId and shardId ShardCoordinator.LeastShardAllocationStrategy will be used for shard allocation strategy.

        Specified by:
        spawn in interface ClusterSharding
        Parameters:
        behavior - Create the behavior for an entity given a entityId
        entityProps - (undocumented)
        typeKey - A key that uniquely identifies the type of entity in this cluster
        settings - (undocumented)
        maxNumberOfShards - (undocumented)
        handOffStopMessage - Message sent to an entity to tell it to stop, e.g. when rebalanced.
        Returns:
        (undocumented)

      • spawn

        public <A> ActorRef<ShardingEnvelope<A>> spawn(EntityIdToBehavior<A> behavior,
                                               Props entityProps,
                                               EntityTypeKey<A> typeKey,
                                               ClusterShardingSettings settings,
                                               int maxNumberOfShards,
                                               A handOffStopMessage)
        Description copied from class: ClusterSharding
        Spawn a shard region or a proxy depending on if the settings require role and if this node has such a role.

        Messages are sent to the entities by wrapping the messages in a ShardingEnvelope with the entityId of the recipient actor. A HashCodeMessageExtractor will be used for extracting entityId and shardId ShardCoordinator.LeastShardAllocationStrategy will be used for shard allocation strategy.

        Specified by:
        spawn in class ClusterSharding
        Parameters:
        behavior - Create the behavior for an entity given a entityId
        entityProps - (undocumented)
        typeKey - A key that uniquely identifies the type of entity in this cluster
        settings - (undocumented)
        maxNumberOfShards - (undocumented)
        handOffStopMessage - Message sent to an entity to tell it to stop, e.g. when rebalanced.
        Returns:
        (undocumented)

                                                   EntityTypeKey<A> typeKey,
                                                   ClusterShardingSettings settings,
                                                   ShardingMessageExtractor<E,A> extractor,
                                                   scala.Option<ShardCoordinator.ShardAllocationStrategy> allocationStrategy)
        Description copied from interface: ClusterSharding
        Spawn a shard region or a proxy depending on if the settings require role and if this node has such a role.

        Specified by:
        spawnWithMessageExtractor in interface ClusterSharding
        Parameters:
        behavior - Create the behavior for an entity given a entityId
        entityProps - Props to apply when starting an entity
        typeKey - A key that uniquely identifies the type of entity in this cluster
        settings - (undocumented)
        extractor - Extract entityId, shardId, and unwrap messages.
        allocationStrategy - Allocation strategy which decides on which nodes to allocate new shards, ClusterSharding.defaultShardAllocationStrategy(akka.cluster.sharding.typed.ClusterShardingSettings) is used if None
        Returns:
        (undocumented)

      • entityRefFor

        public <A> EntityRef<A> entityRefFor(EntityTypeKey<A> typeKey,
                                     java.lang.String entityId)
        Description copied from interface: ClusterSharding
        Create an ActorRef-like reference to a specific sharded entity. Currently you have to correctly specify the type of messages the target can handle.

        Messages sent through this EntityRef will be wrapped in a ShardingEnvelope including the here provided entityId.

        For in-depth documentation of its semantics, see EntityRef.

        Specified by:
        entityRefFor in interface ClusterSharding
        Parameters:
        typeKey - (undocumented)
        entityId - (undocumented)
        Returns:
        (undocumented)

                                     java.lang.String entityId)
        Description copied from class: ClusterSharding
        Create an ActorRef-like reference to a specific sharded entity. Currently you have to correctly specify the type of messages the target can handle.

        Messages sent through this EntityRef will be wrapped in a ShardingEnvelope including the here provided entityId.

        For in-depth documentation of its semantics, see EntityRef.

        Specified by:
